product_name: Merrell Lidia Capri Pants - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Nothing beats the functional hiking and walking comfort of the quick-drying, sun-blocking Merrell Lidia Capri Pants. They're made to meet the demands of trail and travel in style. Lightweight heathered fabric drapes nicely, wicks moisture away from your skin and dries quickly, so you stay comfortable. Fabric offers outstanding UPF 50+ sun protection. Gusseted crotch eliminates chafing for walking comfort. Drawcord waist lets you fine-tune the fit. Merrell Lidia Capri Pants provide 2 slash hand pockets with button tabs, a leg cargo pocket, and 2 back pockets with button tabs. Closeout.
short_description: Nothing beats the functional hiking and walking comfort of the quick-drying, sun-blocking Merrell Lidia Capri Pants. They're made to meet the demands of trail and travel in style.
